UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: The ascaphins: a family of antimicrobial peptides from the skin secretions of the most primitive extant frog, Ascaphus truei.
Literature.Author: Conlon JM, Sonnevend A, Davidson C, Smith DD, Nielsen PF

Literature.Title: Computational design of highly selective antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Author: Juretic D, Vukicevic D, Ilic N, Antcheva N, Tossi A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>200 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=80 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=25µM),Enterobacter cloacae NHTCC 53001(MIC=6µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae KK3 9904(MIC=6µM),Proteus mirabilis ATCC 25933(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 8325(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis RP62A(MIC=50µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>100µM),Streptococcus group B HNTCC 80130(MIC=13µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=32µM)
